declare @q nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @m int select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'phlsx' and column_name = 'so_lsx' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName'
update @@table set so_lsx = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_lsx))) + rtrim(so_lsx)
create table #r(tk_co varchar(32), ten_tk nvarchar(512), ma_kh_i varchar(32), ten_kh_i nvarchar(512), tien_nt numeric(19, 4), dien_giai nvarchar(512), ma_vv varchar(32), ma_bp varchar(32), so_lsx varchar(32), ma_sp varchar(32), ma_hd varchar(32), ma_phi varchar(32), ma_ku varchar(32), ref varchar(32), stt int)
select @q = 'insert into #r(tk_co, ten_tk, ma_kh_i, ten_kh_i, tien_nt, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ref, stt)' select @q = @q + ' select a.tk_co, case when b.loai_tk = 1 then b.ten_tk%l else null end, a.ma_kh_i, c.ten_kh%l, ' select @q = @q + ' tien_nt, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, '''', a.stt' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a left join dmtk b on a.tk_co = b.tk left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh_i = c.ma_kh' exec sp_executesql @q
&CheckImportUserDefinedFields;
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select tk_co, ten_tk, ma_kh_i, ten_kh_i, tien_nt, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, ref from #r order by stt return
